songs.title: I Need A Hitta
songs.lyrics:
[Hook x4]
I need a hitta dread head drilla
Cash style nigga cause I'm a lady hitter

[Verse 1]
I'm a lady hitta don't fuck with hater niggas
I murderin the scene so you know I'm bout to kill em
Don't conversate with lames
Schools out so dismiss em
[?]
These niggas tryna holla and I ain't fuckin with em
But if he eat the [?] then maybe i'll reconsider
I'm famous take a picture and ain't a bitch realer
I'd shoot you if I wanted to cause I'm a lady hitter

[Hook x4]
I need a hitta dread head drilla
Cash style nigga cause I'm a lady hitter

[Verse 2]
I'm a hitter she's a hitter ain't nobody fuckin with us
Cashin out ballin out niggas wanna fuck with us
Do not fuck with bum niggas, no you can't get her nigga
Money make me cum nigga
Bout that bag I drill with you
Play with me I deal with you
I only fuck with real hittas
Shout out to my real bitches
No time for you fake bitches
Shells for you snake bitches
Thirties [?] really racial bitches
(This for them hittas)

[Hook x4]
I need a hitta dread head drilla
Cash style nigga cause I'm a lady hitter
